titles.title: To you who fear my name

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
To you who fear My name
The Son of righteousness shall rise
With healing in His wings;
With healing in His wings.(2)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
And you shall skip about with joy
Like calves led from the stall,
And you shall tread the wicked down
Thus saith the Lord of all.
